attributes.action: Make fewer offences punishable by imprisonment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prison clearly does not work (witness the recidivism rate) so stop sending so many people to prison. People who go to prison clearly have problems. Try to re-educate and empower them and give them opportunities within legitimate society. Prison should be restricted to those who are a real danger to society, such as paedophiles and psychopaths, who should be treated well but kept confined until they are better, which in many cases would be never so they should spend the rest of their lives in prison.
